sentences.en: A religion is only a system of beliefs, and to say that all beliefs deserve equal respect or acceptance is to say that ideas have no moral weight, a patent absurdity.
sentences.cn: 宗教说到底只是一套信仰体系，如果说所有的信仰都该获得相同的尊重和认可，就等于说思想没有道德善恶之分，很显然这太过荒谬。

sentences.en: And as such, he understood perhaps better than anyone the sheer absurdity, but absolute necessity, of attempting to derive meaning from the universe of knowledge.
sentences.cn: 作为图书馆员，他或许比任何人都了解，试图从知识的宇宙中产生意义，这件事是绝对荒谬的，但也是绝对必要的。

sentences.en: British design critic John Thakara pointed to the absurdity of the current trend towards hyping design.
sentences.cn: 英国的设计评论家约翰-撒克若指出:目前广告设计中的刻意渲染趋势是荒唐的.

sentences.en: He insisted in an extremely agitated fashion on the absurdity of the parallel.
sentences.cn: 他还是十分激动地坚决指出这种类比是荒谬的.

sentences.en: He was dressed for the pantomime, in all the absurdity of a clown's costume.
sentences.cn: 他穿着演哑剧的服装, 是荒唐不堪的小丑装.

sentences.en: His face was coarse - slack from illness, suffering, and absurdity.
sentences.cn: 他脸上的肌肉粗糙松弛,是病痛 、 苦难和荒唐生活造成的结果.

sentences.en: His story of being kidnapped by little green men was sheer absurdity.
sentences.cn: 他说他遭到矮小的绿种人绑架,这纯粹是无稽之谈.

sentences.en: I earn for thanks two samples of blind ingratitude, stupid to absurdity!
sentences.cn: 我得到的报答却是两种盲目的忘恩负义, 愚蠢得荒谬!

sentences.en: I find myself growing increasingly angry at the absurdity of the situation.
sentences.cn: 对如此荒谬可笑的情况我感到越来越生气。

sentences.en: It was only later that she could see the absurdity of the situation.
sentences.cn: 只是到了后来她才看出了那种局面的荒唐.

sentences.en: Once aboard we were soon helpless with laughter at the absurdity of it.
sentences.cn: 一上飞机我们就按捺不住，大笑起这事的荒唐。

sentences.en: She recognized the absurdity of dealing with them through intermediaries.
sentences.cn: 她认识到,通过中间人与他们打交道是愚蠢的.

sentences.en: The absurdity of the situation made everyone laugh.
sentences.cn: 情况的荒谬可笑使每个人都笑了.

sentences.en: The fallacy has been exposed in its naked absurdity.
sentences.cn: 这谬论的荒诞性已被充分揭露.

sentences.en: The proposal borders upon the absurdity.
Well-meaning ineptitude rises to empyreal absurdity.
sentences.cn: 善意的愚蠢行为导致最大的荒唐。

sentences.en: What are we when confronted with the interior vortex which swallows us into absurdity?
sentences.cn: 当面对内心的漩涡，把我们卷入荒谬的漩涡时，我们是什么呢？
